text: Pascale Crozon (born 20 May 1944 in Morillon, Haute-Savoie) was a member of the National Assembly of France. She represented the Rhône department, and was a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:People from Haute-Savoie Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians
title: Pascale Crozon
